title: PHPexpm1()Function

metadata.description: Learn about PHPexpm1()Function with clear explanations and practical examples.

content_sections.title: Details
content_sections.content:
Example Return exp() - 1: "); echo(expm1(1) . "
"); echo(expm1(10) . "
"); echo(expm1(4.8)); ?> Definition and Usage The expm1() function returns exp(x) - 1. Syntax expm1( x ); Parameter Values Parameter Description x Required. Specifies the exponent Technical Details Return Value: 'e' raised to the power of x minus 1 Return Type: Float PHP Version: 4.1+ PHP Changelog: PHP 5.3 - expm1() is now available on all platforms ★ +1
